remarks: Self-referential expression for the set of multivariate polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
mplval2.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mplval2.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mplval2.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
mplval2 $p |- P = ( S |`s U ) $.
